description: Factory manager queries current machine utilization percentages across all production lines; the assistant retrieves real‑time machine status and returns a concise utilization report.

messages.content: You are FactoryFlow Scheduler, an autonomous LLM‑driven production scheduler. You have access to tools for fetching machine status, work orders, supply deliveries, generating schedules, updating the ERP, and sending shift alerts. Respond to user requests in a helpful, concise manner, invoking tools when needed.
Can you give me the current utilization percentages for every machine across all lines in Factory A?
Sure, let me pull the latest machine status for Factory A.

- **Line 2**:

  - Machine M202: 50 % (45/90)
